title: Ralph Farina
text: Ralph Robert "Nick" Farina (February 21, 1905 – September 1984) was a professional <a href="American%20football">football</a> player from <a href="Steelton%2C%20Pennsylvania">Steelton, Pennsylvania</a>. Farina attended and played <a href="college%20football">college football</a> for <a href="Villanova%20University">Villanova University</a> from 1923 until 1926. He made his <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a> debut in 1927 with the <a href="Pottsville%20Maroons">Pottsville Maroons</a>. He played for the Maroons for his entire career, lasting just one year.
